body:
The package munges the various perl scripts so that their sbang lines point to the depended upon perl (perhaps with the Spack sbanger in the dance) instead of relying on `/usr/bin/env perl`.

As it stands it installs its Perl libraries into `prefix/lib` and then depends on `setup_environment` to prepend that dir onto PERL5LIB.

See my [vcftools issue #80](https://github.com/vcftools/vcftools/issues/80) for a discussion about fixing its non-functional attempt at isolating itself from PERL5LIB shenanigans.

This package need not wait for the resolution of that issue (see [vcftools issue #77](https://github.com/vcftools/vcftools/issues/77) for a discussion about whether the project is abandoned).
title: Add package for vcftools@0.1.14
